instruction: You are an oncologist. Classify the irregularity level between blood vessels (red: arteries, green: veins) and tumor (yellow) on CT scans using the criteria below:

criteria.label: Normal
criteria.description: Smooth, continuous vessel wall resembling healthy skin surface

criteria.label: Mild invasion
criteria.description: Focal wall thickening/slight unevenness (like tiny skin protrusions)

criteria.label: Moderate invasion
criteria.description: Multiple irregularities with wall discontinuity (like severe acne marks)

criteria.label: Severe invasion
criteria.description: Complete structural loss: encasement (vessel deformation) or infiltration (intraluminal growth)
